title: Italy’s CubeSat Mission to a Martian Moon Enters Phase B Development
summary:
Italian space agency ASI has announced that its CubeSat mission to the Martian moon Deimos has entered Phase B, marking the commencement of preliminary design work for both the orbiter and lander. The Terrain Analyzer and Sample Tester Explorer (TASTE) is the tenth mission of ASI’s ALCOR Programme. Preparation for the Programme began in 2020 […]
The post Italy’s CubeSat Mission to a Martian Moon Enters Phase B Development appeared first on European Spaceflight.

title: What is an Engineer? (Grades K-4)
summary: This article is for students grades K-4. Engineers solve problems. They use science and math to create new things or make things work better. There are different kinds of engineers.
